snippet: Mourners came from across the city to attend funeral services for Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator on Sunday.
abstract: Mourners come from across New York City to attend funeral services for 6-year-old Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator in Brooklyn; Daniel St Hubert, who has a deep criminal record and a history of psychiatric problems, has been arrested in connection with the crime.

byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein, J. David Goodman and Marc Santora contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Mourners came from across the city to attend funeral services for Prince Joshua Avitto, who was stabbed to death in a housing project elevator on Sunday.

headline.main: Hundreds Gather to Remember 6-Year-Old Victim of Brooklyn Stabbing
headline.print_headline: Hundreds Gather to Remember 6-Year-Old Victim of Brooklyn Stabbing
